name: program
description: Some organizations organise their services into programs. A program brings together a number of related services.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the program. Each program must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.title: Organization Identifier
organization_id.description: The identifier for the organization which the program belongs to. Each program must belong to a single organization, and the identifier for that organization should be given here.

alternate_name.name: alternate_name
alternate_name.title: Alternate Name
alternate_name.description: If the program has an alternative name it can be given here

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A brief and clear summary of the program
description.example: Comprehensive Mental Health Services available to residents of MyCity including CBT and Counselling. This is not an emergency service and should not be used as an alternative to hospital and GP services.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: The services attributes table creates a link between a service and one or more classifications that describe the nature of the service provided.

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The metadata table contains a record of the changes that have been made to the data in order to maintain provenance information.
